start:
Select a blockchain network from the options below to generate wallets. This bot supports multiple chains like Ethereum (EVM) and TON (Telegram Open Network). 

Your data is secure and remains private with you. Let's get started!
help:
If you need assistance, feel free to send a direct message to @saskakomegunov. 

Here are some common commands: 
/start - Restart the wallet generation process 
/help - Display this help message
thanks:
